snippet.title: EVIL NUN: THE BROKEN MASK - FEAR FEST: CONSOLE REVEAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
Will you uncover the mystery behind the broken mask? Complete puzzles and unlock new paths in a secret-filled school and flee Sister Madeline's religious summer camp in this Stealth Horror adventure. Don't get caught, or you will pay the ultimate price.

Find out more about Evil Nun 👉 https://www.feardemic-games.com/evil-nun-the-broken-mask

- Hammer Time - Avoid Sister Madeline and her huge hammer;
- She Vented - Don’t get surprised when Madeline follows you into hard to reach places;
- Labyrinth of Possibilities - Explore the old school and unlock many new branching paths;
- Thoughts and Prayers - Use your head and solve puzzles to progress further;
- Fight or Flight - Play stealthily or booby trap the building and lure the Nun into them.

More info about Evil Nun on:
WEBSITE - https://www.feardemic-games.com
NEWSLETTER - https://www.feardemic-games.com/newsletter-signup
STEAM - https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/feardemic

TIKTOK - https://www.tiktok.com/@feardemic
TWITCH - https://www.twitch.tv/feardemic
